response.overview: "George and Me" investigates how much of a positive "force" Star Wars has been on fans' lives since its release nearly 30 years ago. The film aims to show that the traditional stereotype of the "geeky" fan has little value in today's world and that being a fan of something can really enrich your life and give you the courage to shoot for the stars. Featuring interviews with fans such as Albin Johnson founder of the 501st, and Shane Felux director of "Revelations", the most successful fan-film to date. It also features many other fans from across the globe who have all done amazing and wonderful things because of their love for Star Wars.
response.tagline: There's a lot of love behind Star Wars
response.title: George and Me
